messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Digest Number 962
messages.msgSnippet: **My dh has some REAL hang ups about food.  He even tried to impose them on me...the nerve!  :-)  I ve tried to educate him on this way of thinking, but I m
messages.messageBody:
**My dh has some REAL hang ups about food. He even tried to impose them on
me...the

nerve! :-) I've tried to educate him on this way of thinking, but I'm
really not all that educated and secure in it myself. Any recommended reading?**

These two titles are the same book. Let them eat Cake was obviously too
threatening for the mainstream mommy lines. Find one or the other, they're both
good reading. :) Deborah in IL

What should I feed my kids? : the pediatrician's guide to safe and healthy
food and growth  1st Ballentine Books ed.
  Kleinman, Ronald E.

Let them eat cake! : the case against controlling what your children eat :
the pediatrician's guide to safe and healthy food and growth  1st ed.
  Kleinman, Ronald E.
